item.description:
Friday ~ September 21, 2012 ~ 8:30 PM

Marty Beecy and the Rogue Loons

FREE SHOW

Originals, Blues and Pop Cover Songs

Main Streets Market & Cafe
42 Main Street, Concord, MA 01742
TEL: 978-369-9948
Road Map: http://mapq.st/vd0HGK
http://www.mainstreetsmarketandcafe.com/
http://www.facebook.com/pages/Main-Streets-Market-Cafe/171737719846

Marty Beecy is currently working on his first CD and hopes to complete it later this year. He has been writing short fiction stories for years and has turned his focus to songwritting for the past 8 years. His last project "Kendrick Square Blues" resulted in a video that was produced by Claude von Roesgen.
http://www.reverbnation.com/martybeecymusic
http://www.myspace.com/martybeecymusic

Marty Beecy is Presented by
Richard Axtman ~ Northern Music
northernmusic@yahoo.com
http://www.myspace.com/northernmusicagency
http://www.facebook.com/richard.axtman
http://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100001577514520
item.name: FREE Show ~ Marty Beecy and the Rogue Loons
